PC instructions
Granting the WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS permission can be granted from the browser on your PC! You don\'t have to mess around with any drivers
Go to Android-Settings -> Phone Info -> Search for Build Number and tap multiple times until the Developer options are active
Go to Android-Settings -> Developer Options -> Enable USB-Debugging
Connect your phone with your PC
Open https://webadb.com in the browser on your PC
Click \"Start\" then \"Add device\" then click "*YOUR DEVICE*" then click \"Connect\"
On your phone click \"Allow\"
On your PC click \"Interactive Shell\"
In the terminal window type-in \"pm grant %s android.permission.WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS\" and hit the enter button
Your device is not rooted you have to use your PC to grant permissions
